CertType.description:
证书类型。
- free：免费证书。

- cas：云盾证书。

- upload：自定义上传。

DomainList.description: 使用此证书的域名列表。

403.errorMessage: The signature we calculated does not match the one you provided. Please refer to the API reference about authentication for details.

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "RequestId": "5C1E43DC-9E51-4771-82C0-7D5ECEB547A1",
  "CertInfos": {
    "CertInfo": [
      {
        "CertExpireTime": "2098-02-08 08:02:07 +0000 UTC",
        "CreateTime": "2015-12-21 08:02:07 +0000 UTC",
        "CertType": "cas",
        "CertName": "example_cert",
        "CertId": "1644xx",
        "DomainList": "[\"example.com\"]",
        "HttpsCrt": "-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----\\nxxx-----END CERTIFICATE-----\\n"
      }
    ]
  }
}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<DescribeCertificateInfoByIDResponse>
    <RequestId>5C1E43DC-9E51-4771-82C0-7D5ECEB547A1</RequestId>
    <CertInfos>
        <CertExpireTime>2098-02-08 08:02:07 +0000 UTC</CertExpireTime>
        <CreateTime>2015-12-21 08:02:07 +0000 UTC</CreateTime>
        <CertType>cas</CertType>
        <CertName>example_cert</CertName>
        <CertId>1644xx</CertId>
        <DomainList>["example.com"]</DomainList>
        <HttpsCrt>-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----\nxxx-----END CERTIFICATE-----\n</HttpsCrt>
    </CertInfos>
</DescribeCertificateInfoByIDResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 查询证书信息-按ID
summary: 调用DescribeCertificateInfoByID按照证书ID查询指定证书信息。
description:
- 单用户调用频率：100次/秒。
- 域名绑定证书后，但证书未启用时，通过该接口查询会提示证书不存在。
